greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Product of divisors of multiply-perfect numbers.
mathematica: s = {}; Do[If[Divisible[DivisorSigma[1, n], n], AppendTo[s, n^(DivisorSigma[0, n]/2)]], {n, 10^4}]; s (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 04 2019 *)
program: (MAGMA) [&*[d: d in Divisors(m)]: m in [1..10^5] | IsIntegral(SumOfDivisors(m)/m)]
xref: See A088843 and A307741 for the number of and the sum of divisors of multiply-perfect numbers.
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, May 26 2019
